entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 09:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain this evening then to snow mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
